name: 3Dash (DelugeDrop)
description:
Hey there! This is the itch.io page for 3Dash, a three-dimensional autoscrolling platformer. 

Use the download links at the bottom to download it.

CONTROLS:

Click/Space - Jump

Escape - Quit to Menu

Z - Place Checkpoint (beta)

X - Remove Checkpoint

Here's a video about the game:

Enjoy!
